data.name: Captain Marvel
data.description: A powerful cosmic soldier who breaks down the defenses of multiple foes and gains overwhelming power in Binary form.

starItems.name: Captain Marvel
starItems.description: A powerful cosmic soldier who breaks down the defenses of multiple foes and gains overwhelming power in Binary form.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from the target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
Clear all positive effects from the target
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + clear all positive effects.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> and <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + clear all positive effects.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>. If in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On losing all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, end <color=#fff568>Binary</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> and <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.

1.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>380%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>460%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Clear all negative effects from self

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Clear all negative effects from self. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>540%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Binary</color>. Clear all negative effects from self. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>640%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage, <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor, <color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus, and <color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
 > On End of Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

On Spawn:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If any <color=#fff568>Charged</color> were cleared, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>
> Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
> If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, gain an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, when this character gains Ability Energy, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

2.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage, <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor, <color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus, and <color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
 > On End of Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

On Spawn:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If any <color=#fff568>Charged</color> were cleared, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>
> Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
> If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, gain an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, when this character gains Ability Energy, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

3.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage, <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor, <color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus, and <color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
 > On End of Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

On Spawn:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If any <color=#fff568>Charged</color> were cleared, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
> Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
> If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, gain an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, when this character gains Ability Energy, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
On Turn, heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
While in Binary, on End of Turn, clear <color=#fff568>Evade</color> on all enemies

4.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage, <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor, <color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus, and <color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
 > On End of Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + clear all <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

On Turn, heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Spawn:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If any <color=#fff568>Charged</color> were cleared, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
> Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
> If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, gain an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, when this character gains Ability Energy, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>A-Force</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

5.description:
While in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage, <color=#86e619>25%</color> Armor, <color=#86e619>100%</color> Focus, and <color=#86e619>100%</color> Resistance.
 > On End of Turn, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + clear all <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies, this attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

On Turn:
 > Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, Heal self and all <color=#fff568>A-Force</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

On Spawn:
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If any <color=#fff568>Charged</color> were cleared, gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
> Gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
> If at least one ally is <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, gain an additional <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health and +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

If not in <color=#fff568>Binary</color>, when this character gains Ability Energy, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
